verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G3146>scourged<s%> him.

And the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G4120>platted<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G173>thorns,<s%> and <S%G2007>put<s%> it <S%G2007>on<s%> his <S%G2776>head,<s%> and they <S%G4016>put<s%> <S%G4016>on<s%> him a <S%G4210>purple<s%> <S%G2440>robe,<s%>
And <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5463>Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%> and they <S%G1325>smote<s%> <S%G4475><s%> him with their <S%G4475>hands.<s%>

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1854>forth<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2396>Behold,<s%> I <S%G71>bring<s%> him <S%G1854>forth<s%> to you, that you may <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G156>fault<s%> in him.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1854>forth,<s%> <S%G5409>wearing<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns,<s%> and the <S%G4210>purple<s%> <S%G2440>robe.<s%> And Pilate <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2396>Behold<s%> the <S%G444>man!<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> and <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, they <S%G2905>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> him, <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him. <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2983>Take<s%> you him, and <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him: for I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G156>fault<s%> in him.

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, We <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3551>law,<s%> and by our <S%G3551>law<s%> he <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G599>die,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he was the <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G5399>afraid;<s%>

And <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4232>judgment<s%> <S%G4232>hall,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> From <S%G4159>where<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you? But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> him <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G612>answer.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> to him, <S%G2980>Speak<s%> you not to me? <S%G1492>know<s%> you not that I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> you, and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> you?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> You could <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> power <S%G1849><s%> at <S%G3762>all<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> me, <S%G1508>except<s%> it were <S%G1325>given<s%> you from <S%G509>above:<s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> he that <S%G3860>delivered<s%> me to you <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G3187>greater<s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

And from <S%G1537>thereafter<s%> <S%G5127><s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G630>release<s%> him: but the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G630>let<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> man <S%G630>go,<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> not <S%G2541>Caesar's<s%> <S%G5384>friend:<s%> <S%G3956>whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G848>himself<s%> a <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G483>speaks<s%> <S%G483>against<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1854>forth,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> in the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> in a <S%G5117>place<s%> that is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G3038>Pavement,<s%> but in the <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G1042>Gabbatha.<s%>

And it was the <S%G3904>preparation<s%> of the <S%G3957>passover,<s%> and <S%G5616>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour:<s%> and he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2396>Behold<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G935>King!<s%>

But they <S%G2905>cried<s%> out, <S%G142>Away<s%> with him, <S%G142>away<s%> with him, <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him. <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Shall I <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G935>King?<s%> The <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> but <S%G2541>Caesar.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> he him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to them to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%> And they <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G520>led<s%> him <S%G520>away.<s%>

And he <S%G941>bearing<s%> his <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a place <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> of a <S%G2898>skull,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> in the <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha:<s%>

<S%G3699>Where<s%> they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> him, and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> with him, <S%G1782>on<s%> <S%G1782>either<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1782>side<s%> one, and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle.<s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G5102>title,<s%> and <S%G5087>put<s%> it <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4716>cross.<s%> And the <S%G1125>writing<s%> was <S%G2424>JESUS<s%> OF <S%G3478>NAZARETH<s%> THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>

<S%G5126>This<s%> <S%G5102>title<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%> for the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> was <S%G1451>near<s%> to the <S%G4172>city:<s%> and it was <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> and <S%G1676>Greek,<s%> and <S%G4513>Latin.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G1125>Write<s%> not, The <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> but that he <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>
<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3739>What<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1125>written.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> his <S%G2440>garments,<s%> and <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> to <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G4757>soldier<s%> a <S%G3313>part;<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> his <S%G5509>coat:<s%> <S%G1161>now<s%> the <S%G5509>coat<s%> was <S%G729>without<s%> <S%G729>seam,<s%> <S%G5307>woven<s%> from the <S%G509>top<s%> <S%G1223>throughout.<s%> <S%G3650><s%>

They <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves,<s%> Let us not <S%G4977>rend<s%> it, but <S%G2975>cast<s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%> for it, <S%G5101>whose<s%> it shall be: that the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> They <S%G1266>parted<s%> my <S%G2440>raiment<s%> among them, and for my <S%G2441>clothing<s%> they did <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2975>lots.<s%> <S%G5023>These<s%> things <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G4160>did.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G2476>stood<s%> by the <S%G4716>cross<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G79>sister,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the wife of <S%G2832>Cleophas,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3936>standing<s%> by, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G25>loved,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%> your son! <S%G5207><s%>

<S%G1534>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to the <S%G3101>disciple,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold<s%> your mother! <S%G3384><s%> And from that <S%G5610>hour<s%> that <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> her to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>home.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> things were <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5055>accomplished,<s%> that the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> might be <S%G5048>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> I thirst. <S%G1372><s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> there was <S%G2749>set<s%> a <S%G4632>vessel<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3690>vinegar:<s%> and they <S%G4130>filled<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge<s%> with <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> it on <S%G5301>hyssop,<s%> and <S%G4374>put<s%> it to his <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> It is finished: <S%G5055><s%> and he <S%G2827>bowed<s%> his <S%G2776>head,<s%> and <S%G3860>gave<s%> up the <S%G4151>ghost.<s%>

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it was the <S%G3904>preparation,<s%> that the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> should not <S%G3306>remain<s%> on the <S%G4716>cross<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day, (for that <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day was an <S%G3173>high<s%> day,) <S%G2065>sought<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that their <S%G4628>legs<s%> might be <S%G2608>broken,<s%> and that they might be <S%G142>taken<s%> away.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%> and <S%G2608>broke<s%> the <S%G4628>legs<s%> of the <S%G4413>first,<s%> and of the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with him.
But <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he was <S%G2348>dead<s%> <S%G2235>already,<s%> they <S%G2608>broke<s%> not his <S%G4628>legs:<s%>

But <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> with a <S%G3057>spear<s%> <S%G3572>pierced<s%> his <S%G4125>side,<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> there out <S%G129>blood<s%> and <S%G5204>water.<s%>

And he that <S%G3708>saw<s%> it <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>record,<s%> and his <S%G3141>record<s%> is <S%G228>true:<s%> and he <S%G1492>knows<s%> that he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G227>true,<s%> that you might <S%G4100>believe.<s%>
For <S%G5023>these<s%> things were <S%G1096>done,<s%> that the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> should be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> A <S%G3747>bone<s%> of him shall not be <S%G4937>broken.<s%>
And <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> They shall <S%G3700>look<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G1574>pierced.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%> of <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G3101>disciple<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> but <S%G2928>secretly<s%> for <S%G5401>fear<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G2065>sought<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that he might <S%G142>take<s%> away the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> and <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2010>gave<s%> him <S%G2010>leave.<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And there <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3530>Nicodemus,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> at the <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G5342>brought<s%> a <S%G3395>mixture<s%> of <S%G4666>myrrh<s%> and <S%G250>aloes,<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G3046>pound<s%> weight.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> they the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1210>wound<s%> it in <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>clothes<s%> with the <S%G759>spices,<s%> as the <S%G1485>manner<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> is to <S%G1779>bury.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> in the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> he was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> there was a <S%G2779>garden;<s%> and in the <S%G2779>garden<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> <S%G1722>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> was <S%G3764>never<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G5087>laid.<s%>

<S%G1563>There<s%> <S%G5087>laid<s%> they <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews'<s%> <S%G3904>preparation<s%> day; for the <S%G3419>sepulcher<s%> was <S%G1451>near<s%> <S%G1451>at<s%> hand.
